name: Magnatrix
description: A matrix of magnets with plenty of tricks to master. Magnatrix by Intellect Games with music by British composer Northern Audio is a physics-based puzzle game with magnets (of course) and a variety of other elements such as movable boxes, boosts and teleporters which players must use to get the ball into the finishing hole. There are 30 levels designed to teach, test and surprise players as well as an easy to use level editor for those looking to try out their hand at some design themselves, after all, designing your own levels is part of the fun of Magnatrix.
